channel.title: UC Merced HPC & JupyterHub Documentation Blog
channel.description: UC Merced HPC & JupyterHub Documentation Blog

item.title: Welcome
item.description: The UC Merced HPC documentation blog page highlights the latest HPC news and developments within the community. The CIRT team encourages users to visit the blog frequently to explore topics of interest and share relevant news with others. We will continue to post updates, news, and opportunities, and we warmly welcome users to participate in these activities.
item.content:encoded:
The UC Merced HPC documentation blog page highlights the latest HPC news and developments within the community. The CIRT team encourages users to visit the blog frequently to explore topics of interest and share relevant news with others. We will continue to post updates, news, and opportunities, and we warmly welcome users to participate in these activities.

Here are a few topics that you might find useful.

  • Community news
    • Campus Champion
    • CaRCC
  • Job opportunies

item.title: Job post
item.description: - System Administrator for HPC cluster at Kansas State University
item.content:encoded:
• System Administrator for HPC cluster at Kansas State University

  • IT Research Security Architect The University of Louisville is seeking an accomplished and innovative professional to serve as IT Research Security Architect. UofL recently announced a major new investment in research computing and we are seeking a security leader who will ensure that our research computing initiatives are built on a foundation of robust and cutting-edge security. We are looking for a candidate who can bridge the technical and academic realms, work collaboratively with diverse teams and implement strategies that enhance both security and research productivity.
